description_expanded: Twin Size 16"" Air Mattress with Built-in Pump is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home. An inflatable twin-size airbed with a built-in electric pump for quick inflation and deflation. Raised 16 inches for comfort, ideal for guests or camping. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
